thread.title: Boston rock star drummer Sib Hashian dead at 67
thread.title_full: Boston rock star drummer Sib Hashian dead at 67

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Boston rock star drummer Sib Hashian dead at 67
text:
Boston rock star drummer Sib Hashian dead at 67 The More Than A Feeling hitmaker collapsed during a performance Share Get daily   
Sib Hashian, original drummer of the band Boston, has died at the age of 67 after collapsing on a cruise during a performance. 
According to TMZ, the drummer – who made the band's self-titled hit record that brought More Than A Feeling to the world – was halfway through a set when he was taken ill. 
CPR was performed on him and a defibrillator was used but he didn't make it, the website reported. 
He had been on the Legends Of Rock cruise that launched from Florida on March 18. According to reports, the cruise will continue and a tribute concert will be held for Sib tonight. Sib, bottom left, with his Boston bandmates (Photo: Getty Images) Like us on Facebook
